name: Drunken Rabotyagi
description:
[Abstract]

This game is a result of a 3-day long Indikator Hyper Casual Jam 2020. The game is aimed at smartphones, but you can play it on Windows also.

[Game idea]

Play as a taskmaster and try to handle your good-for-nothing construction workers! You need to reach the product delivery plan on each level. The plan may include one of several tasks: saw logs, knock wooden bars together, or paint products. Workers are unwilling to do anything except for drinking beer, and you have to chase and shout at them to force them to work.

[Controls]

Android: Tap at the point where you want to go, and the avatar will follow.

Windows: Click at the point where you want to go with left mouse button, and the avatar will follow. You can also use WASD and arrows.

[Team]

Fullname | Discord nickname | City | Role

  • Amir Subaev | Amir Sayonara Boiii#1791 | Innopolis | Programmer
  • Grigoriy Dolgov | Isabelle (Бель или Григорий)#6954 | Innopolis | Programmer
  • Evgeny Panov | Kay.lis#2189 | Innopolis | 2D Artist
  • Ilkham Tyumenev | HocoK#7623 | Kazan | Gamedesigner
  • Bogdan Fedotov | Fenrir Asteron#2906 | Innopolis | Gamedesigner

4 of us are students of Innopolis University, and Ilkham is a student of Kazan Innovative University.

[Sources]

We borrowed some stuff from open resources. They are mostly SFX, music, and tiles. 

  • Taskmaster shout - https://freesound.org/s/202129
  • Worker shout - https://freesound.org/s/9704/
  • Hammer - https://freesound.org/s/406048/
  • Button release - https://freesound.org/s/161595/
  • Win - https://freesound.org/s/487436/
  • Lose - https://freesound.org/s/362204/
  • Tiles - https://tr.pinterest.com/pin/215187688424221465/
  • Cover art original artist is unknown. Original art was borrowed from Avito marketplace.
